The match featured two Super Overs, a first in T20Is.
India recorded their highest partnership in T20Is with Rohit Sharma and Rinku Singh.
India scored 103 runs in the last five overs, the highest in a T20I outside one Nepal vs Mongolia match.
Afghanistan achieved their highest score when chasing against India.
India took 58 runs in the last two overs.
India made three changes to their playing XI, bringing in Sanju Samson, Avesh Khan, and Kuldeep Yadav.
India won the toss and chose to bat first.
The match was broadcast on the Sports 18 network and live-streamed on JioCinema.
